snippet: The new adviser, Allison Gollust, was the executive vice president of corporate communications at NBC Universal when Jeff Zucker was its chief executive.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo hires former NBC Universal executive Allison Gollust to serve as his communications director; Gollust replaces Richard Bamberger, who is leaving the Cuomo administration to pursue work in the private sector.
lead_paragraph: The new adviser, Allison Gollust, was the executive vice president of corporate communications at NBC Universal when Jeff Zucker was its chief executive.

headline.seo: Cuomo Names Allison Gollust as Communications Director
headline.main: Cuomo Picks Communications Chief With NBC Ties
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Picks Communications Chief With NBC Ties
